Module guigame

Package guigame.logic.event

Contains custom Events and EventListeners.
  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    Event
    This interface has the important function for an Event.
    EventListener
    This interface has the important function for an EventListener.
    KeyboardButtonAdapter
    Adapter for keyboard presses.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    ButtonEvent
    Implementation of the Event which should be fired when a button is pressed.
    ButtonListener
    This class is not in use.
    KeyboardPressedEvent
    Implementation of the Event which should be fired when a key on the keyboard is pressed.
    KeyboardPressedEventListener
    An event listener for Keyboard-events.
    PlayersChangedEvent
    Implementation of Event which should be fired when a player is changed on the MainMenu.
    PlayersChangedEventListener
    This event will be triggered when a player-change (on the subMenu) is invoked.
    PlayersNameChangedListener
    Listener to fire when a player name change occurs.
    StartGameEvent
    Implementation of Event which should be fired when a new game should be started (from anywhere).
    StartGameEventListener
    This EventListener is triggered when a new game should be started.
